Articles.Content:
Tip: make more compact fighters. Also why do you have landing gear. If the wing sections flop around, autostrut the ends of the wing sections in place.

you could easily build compact ion fighters and cram like 8 of them in there.

Edited April 27, 2017 by ShadowGoat

Just finished the Carrier, landing gear are for the runway. I don't understand what do you mean for ion fighters, i don't know how to build one of them, and i quiet like my fighters.

Here there is the Carrier

I just removed landing gears from both my crafts

Edited April 27, 2017 by dragonaether
I mean use small drones, or at least reduce the wingspan of the fighters. They're wasting too much space. Btw we just f12 our ships into orbit
Ok i will try to reduce they space usage. For them should I use xenon or normal fuel? (pls tell me normal fuel, it will be a pain to replace the majority of those fuel tanks with xenon.
For ion you need xenon. If you don't want to replace the whole thing just clip them in.
I changed the drone type, added some struts and added vernor engines.
Yesss... much better. I might ask you to send me the craft file so I can look at it in more detail later. It looks great, and now has much more drone firepower.
Life's been super crazy; I'll do my turn today if I can
K cool thx.

I'm not sure I will give you the craft file, you may study my weak spots (every single point basically) to have an advantage over me.

I will upload it soon, i have to modify a couple of things.

Edited April 27, 2017 by dragonaether

Dude no I wouldn't do that if it would make you feel better I can trade you the file for my capital ship- the death.

Edited April 27, 2017 by ShadowGoat

thx, I'm glad to see your ships. i need a little help for my Carrier, it break apart very easely. I need a hand in general to add some sort of stability grid to my ships

here the craft file https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bx6aw9s3V5WZZDRueTU5ZVU0VnM

Sorry but it isn't the most beatiful thing, i had to add a lot of struts (maybe too much) and the command center isn't the best too, i could have made it better,  my original idea, the one with the massive other carrier was to build a mouvable hangar door at the top, like star wars, but was too much complicated. I think i will try to tune a bit this command center, leveling it up.

Can I ask just a thing? When someone battle against me, if can you use the porkjet expansion pack.

Edited April 27, 2017 by dragonaether
You could use autostruts. They have no substance. Also no mods I'll give you the craft file tonight.

i used it, but it doesn't work that much, i will uninstall all mods and i will replace the things

 

Edited April 27, 2017 by dragonaether
K.cool

i've just updated my two vessels, now they are 100% free from mods, the only mods that i kept are ghrapics mods, rasterprop monitor and bettertimewarp and a couple more, but they shouldn't affect physics, crafts or saves.
K cool. I'll try to get the death up tonight.

-Deleted because it double posted-

Edited April 28, 2017 by ShadowGoat

Have you made some improvements to the death? One simple change I just thought of was swapping the I-Beams and the cluster nukes around, as the nukes are guided, and I-Beams aren't the most accurate weapons, and the more centralised they are the better.
I prefer my I-Beams unguided
Yes. Guided i beams just ups the part count but doesn't have any real positives.
@DarkOwl57 where's that persist file?

Wow, all nice ships, freaking more powerfull than my ships. Someone want to battle with me? 

And, someone can give me a craft pretty strong(heavy armour)? I want to make a couple experiments

Edited April 29, 2017 by dragonaether
This is what happen when you challenge me

if you could make an effort emmiting less magneto, electro µµµµµµvariations when you peops are making "plan between plan between plan" i would appreciate it thks ^^

i don't mind you're doing it , i just ask your doing it less loudly across the backbone ^^ that would be kind thks ^^

Edited April 29, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''
